basics.name: Sergio Acosta Quintana
basics.label: Full-Stack Engineer (Backend Focused) | Java & Cloud
basics.summary: Backend-focused Software Engineer with production experience building scalable, event-driven microservices for enterprise environments (IKEA). Specialized in modernizing legacy architectures to Cloud-Native Spring Boot systems on AWS. Proven track record of reducing data processing latency by 55% through automation. Remote-ready and proficient in React/TypeScript for full-stack autonomy.

work.name: IKEA / BITBOX S.L.
highlights: Built high-throughput Spring Boot microservices supporting IKEA's loyalty platform, handling transactions for 400,000+ active users.
Migrated legacy PL/SQL monoliths to an event-driven Kafka architecture, improving system fault tolerance.
Automated data pipelines to replace 7 manual batch jobs, reducing processing time by 55% and saving 40+ engineering hours monthly.
Designed and implemented a multi-insurance provider aggregation system for retail insurance, using event-driven microservices to decouple provider integrations.

projects.name: NEXO CLOUD (SaaS)
highlights: Built a production-ready RAG system using Spring Boot, Redis queues, and Cloudflare R2 for scalable document processing.
Designed asynchronous ingestion pipeline handling 1,000+ documents/hour with p99 latency under 200ms.
Integrated OpenAI API and vector search, optimizing costs by 30% through intelligent caching and batch processing.

education.institution: University of Las Palmas de Gran Canaria
